review: I would have given it more stars but the extender was faulty and they didn't have one in stock. Still have not received that. Also, it's a little spotty hooking up to my 2nd TV even though I bought a Wi-Fi booster.

review: Outstanding product  I got it with  the subscription to sling TV amazing love to watch my hgtv

review: It was very simple to install and to use, and my wife and I really enjoy the movies and the TV shows. We have only had the TV stick less than two weeks, so far we really enjoy it.
